meanings.definition: A person whose wealth amounts to a million or more in some unit of currency.
meanings.sent1: Many millionaires live in big houses.
meanings.sent2: The city is home to several millionaires.
meanings.sent3: The millionaires threw a lavish party on their yacht.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, millionaires are like kings.
meanings.sent5: The charity event was attended by generous millionaires.

meanings.sent1: She counted the millionaires in the room.
meanings.sent2: The millionaires' cars lined the street.
meanings.sent3: The group of millionaires shared a secret handshake.
meanings.sent4: The millionaires' club was exclusive and prestigious.
meanings.sent5: The millionaires' donations helped many people in need.
